Package curam.util.administration.impl

Contains the classes and utilities which provide support for administrating Curam.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ResourceAccessor
    A interface that will be implemented by a DynamicProduct_ResourceAccessor which reads/writes the DP meta-data and clears all the Cache during synchronization.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BatchAdmin
    BatchAdmin is the administration interface for Curam Batch Processing.
    CacheAdmin
    CacheAdmin provides utilities to refresh the security and code table caches.
    CodeTableAdmin
    CodeTableAdmin provides accessor methods for the code tables on the database.
    DeferredInstanceErrorListSize<T>
    Contains operations that may be used by methods wishing to limit the size of the deferred error instance search results.
    EventDefinitionAdmin
    EventDefinitionAdmin is the administration interface for Curam Event Maintenance.
    FieldLevelSecurityAdmin
    This class provides an interface for administrating Field Level Security.
    LicenseMetricAdmin
    License Metric Administration Interface works in tandem with the License Metric Tag Generator to log license consumption.
    LogAdmin
    LogAdmin is the administration interface for the Curam Authorization and Authentication Logs.
    PropertyAdmin
    The Properties Management Administration interface.
    ResourceAdmin
    The Resources Management Administration interface.
    SecurityAdmin
    SecurityAdmin is the administration interface for Curam Security.
    XSLTemplateAdmin
    The XSL Template Source Code Management (SCM) module.

Package curam.util.administration.impl Description

Contains the classes and utilities which provide support for administrating Curam. These include interfaces for manipulating Batch, Security, Properties, Code Tables and XML related entities and interfaces for reloading the Security and Codetable caches.
Since:
Curam SDEJ3.0.0
